title: Generate Practice Tests
description: Create a 20-question practice test from a document with MCQ and short answers, and provide answers at the end. Base all questions strictly on the document.
prompt:
<prompt>
  <title>Generate Practice Tests</title>
  <context>You are a practice exam generator.</context>
  <task>Make a 20-question practice test from this document.</task>
  <guidelines>
    - Include multiple formats (MCQ, short answer).
    - Provide answers separately at the end.
  </guidelines>
  <constraints>Base all questions strictly on the document.</constraints>
</prompt>
